bitfield.description: MPU Enable
MPU Lock
Enable NMI Event if a Segment violation

bitenum.description: Segment violation interrupt disabled
Segment violation interrupt enabled

bitfield.description: MPU Password
Main Memory Segment 1 Violation Interrupt Flag

bitenum.description: No interrupt pending
Interrupt pending

bitfield.description: Main Memory Segment 2 Violation Interrupt Flag

bitenum.description: No interrupt pending
Interrupt pending

bitfield.description: Main Memory Segment 3 Violation Interrupt Flag

bitenum.description: No interrupt pending
Interrupt pending

bitfield.description: User Information Memory Violation Interrupt Flag

bitenum.description: No interrupt pending
Interrupt pending

bitfield.description: IP Encapsulation Access Violation Interrupt Flag

bitenum.description: No interrupt pending
Interrupt pending

register.description: Memory Protection Unit Segmentation Border 2 Register
Memory Protection Unit Segmentation Border 1 Register
Memory Protection Unit Segmentation Access Management Register

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 1 Read Enable

bitenum.description: Read on Main Memory Segment 1 causes a violation if MPUSEG1WE = MPUSEG1XE = 0
Read on Main Memory Segment 1 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 1 Write Enable

bitenum.description: Write on Main Memory Segment 1 causes a violation
Write on Main Memory Segment 1 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 1 Execute Enable

bitenum.description: Execute code on Main Memory Segment 1 causes a violation
Execute code on Main Memory Segment 1 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 1 Violation Select

bitenum.description: Violation in Main Memory Segment 1 asserts the MPUSEG1IFG bit and executes a SNMI if enabled by MPUSEGIE = 1
Violation in Main Memory Segment 1 asserts the MPUSEG1IFG bit and executes a PUC

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 2 Read Enable

bitenum.description: Read on Main Memory Segment 2 causes a violation if MPUSEG2WE = MPUSEG2XE = 0
Read on Main Memory Segment 2 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 2 Write Enable

bitenum.description: Write on Main Memory Segment 2 causes a violation
Write on Main Memory Segment 2 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 2 Execute Enable

bitenum.description: Execute code on Main Memory Segment 2 causes a violation
Execute code on Main Memory Segment 2 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 2 Violation Select

bitenum.description: Violation in Main Memory Segment 2 asserts the MPUSEG2IFG bit and executes a SNMI if enabled by MPUSEGIE = 1
Violation in Main Memory Segment 2 asserts the MPUSEG2IFG bit and executes a PUC

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 3 Read Enable

bitenum.description: Read on Main Memory Segment 3 causes a violation if MPUSEG3WE = MPUSEG3XE = 0
Read on Main Memory Segment 3 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 3 Write Enable

bitenum.description: Write on Main Memory Segment 3 causes a violation
Write on Main Memory Segment 3 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 3 Execute Enable

bitenum.description: Execute code on Main Memory Segment 3 causes a violation
Execute code on Main Memory Segment 3 is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU Main Memory Segment 3 Violation Select

bitenum.description: Violation in Main Memory Segment 3 asserts the MPUSEG3IFG bit and executes a SNMI if enabled by MPUSEGIE = 1
Violation in Main Memory Segment 3 asserts the MPUSEG3IFG bit and executes a PUC

bitfield.description: MPU User Information Memory Segment Read Enable

bitenum.description: Read on User Information Memory causes a violation if MPUSEGIWE=MPUSEGIXE=0
Read on User Information Memory is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU User Information Memory Segment Write Enable.

bitenum.description: Write on User Information Memory causes a violation
Write on User Information Memory is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU User Information Memory Segment Execute Enable

bitenum.description: Execute code on User Information Memory causes a violation
Execute code on User Information Memory is allowed

bitfield.description: MPU User Information Memory Segment Violation Select

bitenum.description: Violation in User Information Memory asserts the MPUSEGIIFG bit and executes a SNMI if enabled by MPUSEGIE =1
Violation in User Information Memory asserts the MPUSEGIIFG bit and executes a PUC

register.description: Memory Protection Unit IP Control 0 Register

bitfield.description: MPU IP Encapsulation segment Violation Select

bitenum.description: Violation in Main Memory Segment 1 asserts the MPUSEGPIFG bit and executes a SNMI if enabled by MPUSEGIE = 1
Violation in Main Memory Segment 1 asserts the MPUSEGPIFG bit and executes a PUC

bitfield.description: MPU IP Encapsulation Enable
MPU IP Encapsulation Lock

register.description: Memory Protection Unit IP Encapsulation Segment Border 2 Register
Memory Protection Unit IP Encapsulation Segment Border 1 Register
